scripts.build: yarn build:clean && yarn build:typescript && yarn build:static
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "yarn tsc --project tsconfig.build.json --watch" "nodemon -r dotenv/config -q --inspect dist/index.js"
scripts.sam:build: yarn build && sam build --profile claudia --region us-west-1
scripts.sam:local: yarn sam:build && sam local start-api --profile claudia --region us-west-1
scripts.sam:deploy: yarn sam:build && sam deploy --profile claudia --region us-west-1 --config-env prod --parameter-overrides 'EnvironmentType=prod VisualCrossingApiKey=N6D2TQKQXUA4JAT8QQFW3M4DF' --no-confirm-changeset --resolve-s3 --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM
scripts.sam:deploy:qa: yarn sam:build && sam deploy --profile claudia --region us-west-1 --config-env qa --parameter-overrides 'EnvironmentType=qa VisualCrossingApiKey=N6D2TQKQXUA4JAT8QQFW3M4DF' --no-confirm-changeset --resolve-s3 --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM
scripts.sam:deploy:dev: yarn sam:build && sam deploy --profile claudia --region us-west-1 --config-env dev --parameter-overrides 'EnvironmentType=dev VisualCrossingApiKey=N6D2TQKQXUA4JAT8QQFW3M4DF' --no-confirm-changeset --resolve-s3 --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM
